content: Great to see a dedicated Stream for Touchstone and congratulations to AEGIS on the instant release of tests for R3 - look forward to using them over the coming days to put an updated version of Terminz through its paces.

@Richard Ettema I'm not seeing any "Existing" options in the Terminology Tests for R3 - yet I am seeing new client and server id options for CodeSystem and ConceptMap. I thought that you were thinking of removing the client and server id options that previously only existed for the ValueSet tests? Appreciate if this is WIP!
@Peter Jordan I haven't ported the Terminology tests from FHIR 1.8 to 3.0 yet. It's on my list of to-dos and I hope to get that done in the next few days. Yes, definitely a WIP. :)
@Richard Ettema. Thanks for loading all the Terminology tests for FHIR R3/Connectathon 15. Now that it's been Touchstone tested, I can announce the release of the R3 version of my Terminology Server!
